description: Unified Medical Forms Mapping System - Complete source of truth for canonical fields and form implementations

clinicalInformation.description: Clinical and wound-related information not in canonical fields

fieldNameNormalization.description: Rules for normalizing field names across forms

rules.description: Remove asterisk prefix for required fields
Normalize multiple spaces to single space

phoneNumbers.normalize: Remove all non-numeric characters except extensions

bestPractices: Always validate against canonical field definitions before processing
Use alternateKeys to match fields that may have different names across forms
Apply validation rules consistently across all form implementations
Handle missing required fields gracefully with clear error messages
Normalize data according to the rules before storage or transmission

errorHandling.missingRequiredFields: Highlight missing fields and prevent form submission
errorHandling.invalidFormat: Show inline validation errors with format hints
errorHandling.duplicateEntries: Check for existing records before creating new ones

dataFlow.processing: Map to canonical fields using this unified system
dataFlow.validation: Apply all validation rules and check requirements
dataFlow.output: Standardized data ready for downstream systems
